channel.title: Help
channel.description: How do i make a person admin i can not find how and im getting very mad becuase i have tried lots of sttuff so can some1 tell me how please :cool:

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:

search for who u wanna make admin/mod
